doc:
Gérard Darmon https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/G%C3%A9rard_Darmon 0 Gérard Darmon (born 29 February 1948) is a French actor and singer. He is the second husband of Mathilda May. He has three children: Virginie (born 1968) and the last two by Mathilda May, daughter Sarah (born 17 August 1994) and son Jules (born 4 March 1997). Darmon also did a cover of "Mambo Italiano". Darmon is of Algerian-Jewish origin. In July 2012, he was naturalized Moroccan by a decree from King Mohamed VI. Gérard_Darmon ( born 29_February_1948 ) is a_French_actor_and_singer . He is the_second_husband of Mathilda_May . He has three_children : Virginie_( born 1968_) and the_last_two by Mathilda_May , daughter_Sarah_( born 17_August_1994 ) and son_Jules_( born 4_March_1997_) . Darmon also did a_cover of "_Mambo_Italiano_" . Darmon is of Algerian-Jewish_origin . In July_2012 , he was naturalized_Moroccan by a_decree from King_Mohamed_VI .
